activities.title: Arrive at Corfu International Airport
activities.description: Begin your Mediterranean adventure arriving at Corfu's main airport

activities.title: Lunch at Mikro Cafe
activities.description: Light lunch with perfect terrace overlooking Old Town's stepped streets

activities.title: Explore UNESCO Corfu Old Town
activities.description: Wander through Venetian alleys, visit Liston arcade, and browse artisan shops

activities.title: Old Fortress (Palaio Frourio) Sunset
activities.description: Golden hour walk and climb for panoramic sunset views over Corfu

activities.title: Dinner at Salto Wine Bar & Bistro
activities.description: Romantic dinner with fresh octopus carpaccio in converted Venetian mansion

activities.title: Achilleion Palace Visit
activities.description: Tour Empress Sisi's stunning summer palace with gardens and terrace views

activities.title: Lunch at Limnopoula Fish Taverna
activities.description: Legendary fresh grilled fish at Corfu's best-rated seafood restaurant in Petriti

activities.title: Doukades Village Visit
activities.description: Experience authentic mountain village life with coffee at the village square

activities.title: Dinner at Taverna Ninos
activities.description: Authentic local dining with famous pastitsada where Corfiots eat

activities.title: Paleokastritsa Monastery
activities.description: Visit 13th-century monastery with beautiful gardens and icon museum

activities.title: Beach Time at Paleokastritsa
activities.description: Swim in crystal-clear turquoise waters at main beach with sunbed rental

activities.title: Lunch at Dolphin Taverna
activities.description: Family-run taverna with jaw-dropping bay views, fresh calamari and moussaka

activities.title: Boat Trip to Sea Caves
activities.description: Explore hidden caves and swim in secluded coves around Paleokastritsa

activities.title: Sunset at 7th Heaven Cafe
activities.description: Best sunset spot in Corfu with cocktails on cliff-edge terrace at Loggas Beach

activities.title: Hike to Porto Timoni Beach
activities.description: 45-minute scenic hike to Corfu's most photographed double bay beach

activities.title: Swim at Porto Timoni
activities.description: Relax and snorkel at the stunning twin bays with picnic lunch

activities.title: Cape Drastis Visit
activities.description: Dramatic white cliffs meeting turquoise sea - perfect for photos

activities.title: Canal d'Amour Swimming
activities.description: Swim through Channel of Love's unique sandstone formations

activities.title: Dinner at Yialos Restaurant
activities.description: Romantic beachfront dining with fresh fish platter and sunset views

activities.title: Agni Bay Arrival
activities.description: Visit one of Corfu's most exclusive spots with crystal-clear waters

activities.title: Lunch at Toula's Taverna
activities.description: Splurge on impeccable seafood where luxury yacht owners dine

activities.title: Kassiopi Village Exploration
activities.description: Explore charming fishing village and castle ruins with secret beach pathway

activities.title: Farewell Dinner at Etrusco
activities.description: Michelin-level tasting menu at Corfu's most romantic fine dining restaurant

activities.title: Corfu Port Ferry Terminal
activities.description: Check-in for ferry journey to Albania

activities.title: Ferry Departure to Sarande
activities.description: 30-minute scenic ferry crossing with beautiful coastal views

activities.title: Arrive Sarande Ferry Terminal
activities.description: Welcome to Albania - exchange euros and begin Albanian Riviera adventure

activities.title: Lunch at Te Bequa
activities.description: Authentic Albanian cuisine with tavë kosi lamb dish where locals eat

activities.title: Sarande Waterfront Promenade
activities.description: Explore palm-lined seaside walk and visit old synagogue ruins

activities.title: Lëkurës Castle Sunset
activities.description: Drive to hilltop castle for panoramic views over Sarande Bay

activities.title: Dinner at Natyra Restaurant
activities.description: Mixed grill platter with Albanian wine at castle restaurant with views

activities.title: Butrint UNESCO World Heritage Site
activities.description: Explore 2,500 years of history including Roman theatre and Byzantine mosaics

activities.title: Paradise at Ksamil Beach
activities.description: Caribbean-like turquoise waters, swim to small islands nearby

activities.title: Dinner at Haxhi Restaurant
activities.description: Famous pink pasta with shrimp and grilled octopus at family-owned spot

activities.title: Rei dos Mares Boat Tour
activities.description: Full day exploring hidden beaches with onboard BBQ lunch and wine

activities.title: Final Dinner at Meat House
activities.description: Beachfront dining with fresh catch of the day before ferry departure

activities.title: Evening Ferry to Corfu
activities.description: Return ferry journey with sunset views from deck

activities.title: Departure from Corfu Airport
activities.description: End of Mediterranean adventure with transfer to airport
